item.text: For this reason I, Paul, the prisoner of Christ Jesus for the sake of you Gentiles

<st data-num="1487">if</st> <st data-num="1065" class="">indeed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="191">heard</st> of the <st data-num="3622" class="">stewardship</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> that was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="602" class="">revelation</st> the <st data-num="3466">mystery</st><n id="2" /> was made <st data-num="1107" class="">known</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> I <st data-num="4270" class="">wrote before</st> <st data-num="3641">briefly</st>.<n id="3" />

When <st data-num="314" class="">reading</st> this,<n id="1" /> you will be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3539" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4907" class="">insight</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3466">mystery</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>

(<st data-num="3739">which</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1107" class="">disclosed</st> to <st data-num="5207 444">people</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="2087" class="">former</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1074" class="">generations</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> it has <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> been <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="4151">Spirit</st>),

namely, that <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="1510">are</st> <st data-num="4789">fellow heirs</st>, <st data-num="4954">fellow members<n id="2" /> of the body</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4830">fellow partakers</st> of the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

I <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> a <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st> of <st data-num="3739">this gospel</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="1431" class="">gift</st> of <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> that was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1753" class="">exercise</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>.<n id="3" />

To <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>—<st data-num="1646">less than the least</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st>,<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2097" class="">proclaim</st> to the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> the <st data-num="421" class="">unfathomable</st> <st data-num="4149" class="">riches</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="5461" class="">enlighten</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">everyone</st> about God’s <st data-num="3466" class="">secret</st> <st data-num="3622">plan</st><n id="2" />—the <st data-num="3466">mystery</st> that has been <st data-num="613" class="">hidden</st> <st data-num="575" class="">for</st> <st data-num="165" class="">ages</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="4" /> who has <st data-num="2936" class="">created</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>.

The purpose of this enlightenment is <st data-num="2443">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> the <st data-num="4182" class="">multifaceted</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> should <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> be <st data-num="1107">disclosed</st> to the <st data-num="746" class="">rulers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">authorities</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2032">heavenly realms</st>.

This was <st data-num="2596">according to</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="165" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="4286" class="">purpose</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">accomplished</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">boldness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4006">confident</st> <st data-num="4318">access</st><n id="1" /> to God<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223">by way of</st> <st data-num="846">Christ’s</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st>.<n id="4" />
For this reason I ask you not to lose heart because of what I am suffering for you, which is your glory.
For this reason I kneel before the Father,

<st data-num="1537" class="">from</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3965" class="">family</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> is <st data-num="3687" class="">named</st>.

I pray <st data-num="2443">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> he will <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to be <st data-num="2901" class="">strengthened</st> with <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2080" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st>,

that <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> will <st data-num="2730" class="">dwell</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, so that, because you have been <st data-num="4492">rooted</st> and <st data-num="2311">grounded</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26">love</st>,

you will be <st data-num="1840" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2638" class="">comprehend</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> is the <st data-num="4114" class="">breadth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3372" class="">length</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5311" class="">height</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="899" class="">depth</st>,<n id="1" />
and thus to know the love of Christ that surpasses knowledge, so that you will be filled up to all the fullness of God.
Now to him who by the power that is working within us is able to do far beyond all that we ask or think,
to him be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus to all generations, forever and ever. Amen.
